name: downloadFromArchive
description:
Starts an asynchronous request to download snapshots and logs from archival for a given database and recovery point.
If the specified point in time is already available locally, this endpoint throws an error.

id.description: ID of the Microsoft SQL database.

body.description: Configuration for the archive download request.

$ul: **endTime**: The end time of the request.
**message**: The error message for failed IDs.
**id**: The ID of the request object used to poll the status.
**nodeId**: The ID of the node where the job ran.
**progress**: The current percentage progress of the asynchronous request.
**startTime**: The start time of the request.
